resources.string: Do you want to clear all attempt data?

POP!Words is an app to allow kids to practice their high-frequency words. There are forty words included in the app and could be a way to add more down the line.

Popcorn icon made by Freepik from https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/popcorn_2079771

Audio playing animation created by Stephen Ng from https://lottiefiles.com/13622-audio-playing-button
Listen animation created by Juan Carlos Angustia from https://lottiefiles.com/2887-listen-state
Checkmark animation created by Guilherme Schneider from https://lottiefiles.com/5785-checkmark

App created by Michael Fazio
